modName: Hesna Bearclaw Follower by germanware and UUNP Bodyslide Preset - DELETED
summary: Adds a warrior type follower called Hesna Bearclaw. Again, perfect for screen-archery but you can take her out on adventures (she's always ready).
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=4]Sup! Third follower up and ready. I hope she comes without problems.

[b][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b]
- Name: Hesna Bearclaw
- Weight: 100
- Race: Nord
- Marriable: Yup
- Body type: Custom UUNP
- No spells, no traits, no lore, no background story, no nothing. As all my followers, she's intended mostly for screenshots. However, since she's a big gal I felt like I had to give her a proper armor (the really protective kind of armor) and a cool weapon.
- Location: She's at the Dead Man's Drink inn, in Falkreath. 

She's taller than the average character, so everytime she sits down or do an action such as stiring a stew, her height changes to fit those animations. But she goes back to normal once she's done. I don't know how to fix that and I don't really matter that much to be honest. You can use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80763]this mod[/url] to prevent this (Thanks Ennion3 for the suggestion).

If you install this follower, don't keep her all to yourself. Share some screenshots with the rest of us.

[u][center]If you like the follower, please don't forget to [color=#6aa84f]Endorse[/color] it so more people can discover it.
On the contrary if you don't like it, feel free to leave a suggestion.[/center][/u]
[b]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/b]

[u]FAQ (just in case)[/u]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: CBBE body?[/color][/b]
A: Nope.
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Glossiness/Oily body?[/color][/b]
A: Some of the screenshots have the glossiness but don't worry, she won't have it when you install the mod. If you want to add it, check [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JUIPImauPhY]this video[/url].
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Will you release some of your other characters on to the wild?[/color][/b]
A: Eventually.
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: What ENB are you using?[/color][/b]
A: Snapdragon Prime
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: What mod is that gray room on the screenshots from?[/color][/b]
A: Aether Suite.
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Can you upload it to "X" website?[/color][/b]
A: I can but i won't. Nexus is perfectly fine and objectively the best mod site in the entire internet. If you don't like it, i don't know what you're doing here.
[b][color=#e69138][u]Outfits used on the screenshots:[/u][/color][/b] The Book of UUNP, Pampas Set, Zenna Armor. The last white outfit I don't remember the name, it was a while ago.

[u]Huge Thanks to:[/u]
Caliente Ousnius and Jeir for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url]
Expired for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]Racemenu[/url]

Kalilies for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url]
LogRaam for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
Khajiitas for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032]KJ Tattoos[/url]
dePog for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78789]Nordic Warmaiden Hair[/url]
Desufire for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677]The Coenaculi[/url]
Gamefever for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75861]The Book of UUNP[/url]
hothtrooper44 and wulfharth for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644]Immersive Weapons[/url]
tetrodoxin for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86208]Freckle Mania 2

[/url][b]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/b][/size][/font]
